sect2.title: Contents
sect2.para: Major programs in kdeutils include ark, irkick, kcalc, kcharselect, kcmlirc, kdepasswd, kdf, kedit, kfloppy, kgpg, khexedit, kjots, ksim, kregexpeditor, ktimer and kwallet.

sect3.title: irkick
sect3.para: irkick is the infrastructure for KDE's Infrared Remote Control functionality; irkick is the server component of that infrastructure.

sect3.title: kcharselect
sect3.para: kcharselect is a character selector applet.

sect3.title: kdepasswd
sect3.para: kdepasswd is a password managing utility.

sect3.title: kdf
sect3.para: kdf is a disk usage viewer.

sect3.title: kgpg
sect3.para: kgpg is a simple graphical interface for .

sect3.title: kregexpeditor
sect3.para: kregexpeditor is an editor for editing regular expressions in a graphical style (in contrast to the ASCII syntax).
